nodes.text: Grada Zusi was a male Duros who worked supplying bounty hunters as a merchant of the Bounty Supply Company during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Zusi operated out of the Cartel Bazaar section of Carrick Station, a space station used by the Republic fleet. While working Zusi wore a blue and brown shirt and brown pants. He spoke a language other than basic to his customers, and had no hair, green skin and orange eyes.

Grada Zusi first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released in 2011. In the game he acts as a Bounty Supply vendor, accepting Cartel Certificates as payment as well as credits.
